languages.text: Вокс-системы корабля сообщают о нештатной ситуации. Варп-разрывы возникли прямо в рабочих отсеках нижних палуб, и тронувшиеся от колдовской скверны пустотники кланяются являющимся с той стороны демонам как своим владыкам. Требуется немедленная реакция!

The ship's vox-systems have reported an emergency. Warp tears have appeared in maintenance bays on the lower decks, and voidsmen, driven mad by sorcerous corruption, have bowed to the daemons arriving from the other side, their new masters. This calls for an immediate response!
languages.original_text: Вокс-системы корабля сообщают о нештатной ситуации. Варп-разрывы возникли прямо в рабочих отсеках нижних палуб, и тронувшиеся от колдовской скверны пустотники кланяются являющимся с той стороны демонам как своим владыкам. Требуется немедленная реакция!

traits.locale_text: The ship's vox-systems have reported an emergency. Warp tears have appeared in maintenance bays on the lower decks, and voidsmen, driven mad by sorcerous corruption, have bowed to the daemons arriving from the other side, their new masters. This calls for an immediate response!

The ship's vox-systems have reported an emergency. Warp tears have appeared in maintenance bays on the lower decks, and voidsmen, driven mad by sorcerous corruption, have bowed to the daemons arriving from the other side, their new masters. This calls for an immediate response!

The ship's vox-systems have reported an emergency. Warp tears have appeared in maintenance bays on the lower decks, and voidsmen, driven mad by sorcerous corruption, have bowed to the daemons arriving from the other side, their new masters. This calls for an immediate response!

languages.text: 船上的音阵系统报告了紧急情况。亚空间裂隙出现在了下层甲板的维修室内，从中渗出的腐化巫术让一群船员发了疯。这些疯子开始效忠于他们的新主人——来自亚空间的恶魔。这起事故必须立刻处理！
languages.original_text: The ship's vox-systems have reported an emergency. Warp tears have appeared in maintenance bays on the lower decks, and voidsmen, driven mad by sorcerous corruption, have bowed to the daemons arriving from the other side, their new masters. This calls for an immediate response!

traits.locale_text: 船上的音阵系统报告了紧急情况。亚空间裂隙出现在了下层甲板的维修室内，从中渗出的腐化巫术让一群船员发了疯。这些疯子开始效忠于他们的新主人——来自亚空间的恶魔。这起事故必须立刻处理！

languages.text: Los sistemas voco de la nave han informado de una emergencia. Han aparecido agujeros de la disformidad en las zonas de mantenimiento de las cubiertas inferiores, y los soldados del vacío, enloquecidos por la corrupción mágica, se han doblegado ante los daemons que llegan del otro lado, sus nuevos amos. ¡Se necesita una intervención inmediata!
languages.original_text: The ship's vox-systems have reported an emergency. Warp tears have appeared in maintenance bays on the lower decks, and voidsmen, driven mad by sorcerous corruption, have bowed to the daemons arriving from the other side, their new masters. This calls for an immediate response!

traits.locale_text: Los sistemas voco de la nave han informado de una emergencia. Han aparecido agujeros de la disformidad en las zonas de mantenimiento de las cubiertas inferiores, y los soldados del vacío, enloquecidos por la corrupción mágica, se han doblegado ante los daemons que llegan del otro lado, sus nuevos amos. ¡Se necesita una intervención inmediata!

languages.text: 船のヴォクスシステムが緊急事態を告げる。<歪み>のしずくが下位デッキのメンテナンスベイに落ちて、邪な腐敗に魅せられたヴォイズマンが、向こう側から現れた新たな主のディーモンに頭を下げる。即刻対応が必要な事態だ！
languages.original_text: The ship's vox-systems have reported an emergency. Warp tears have appeared in maintenance bays on the lower decks, and voidsmen, driven mad by sorcerous corruption, have bowed to the daemons arriving from the other side, their new masters. This calls for an immediate response!

traits.locale_text: 船のヴォクスシステムが緊急事態を告げる。<歪み>のしずくが下位デッキのメンテナンスベイに落ちて、邪な腐敗に魅せられたヴォイズマンが、向こう側から現れた新たな主のディーモンに頭を下げる。即刻対応が必要な事態だ！

languages.text: Un message d'alerte retentit à travers tous les systèmes-vox. Des déchirures du Warp s'ouvrent dans les baies de maintenance des ponts inférieurs. Rendus fous par cette corruption surnaturelle, les cosmomarins se soumettent aux démons qui en sont sortis et obéissent désormais à leurs nouveaux maîtres. Il faut réagir immédiatement !
languages.original_text: The ship's vox-systems have reported an emergency. Warp tears have appeared in maintenance bays on the lower decks, and voidsmen, driven mad by sorcerous corruption, have bowed to the daemons arriving from the other side, their new masters. This calls for an immediate response!

traits.locale_text: Un message d'alerte retentit à travers tous les systèmes-vox. Des déchirures du Warp s'ouvrent dans les baies de maintenance des ponts inférieurs. Rendus fous par cette corruption surnaturelle, les cosmomarins se soumettent aux démons qui en sont sortis et obéissent désormais à leurs nouveaux maîtres. Il faut réagir immédiatement !

languages.text: Die Voxsysteme des Schiffs haben einen Notfall gemeldet. In Wartungsbuchten auf den Unterdecks haben sich Warprisse geöffnet, und Raumfahrer, die von magischer Verderbnis in den Wahnsinn getrieben wurden, haben sich Dämonen von der anderen Seite unterworfen und sie als ihre neuen Herren akzeptiert. Das verlangt eine sofortige Reaktion!
languages.original_text: The ship's vox-systems have reported an emergency. Warp tears have appeared in maintenance bays on the lower decks, and voidsmen, driven mad by sorcerous corruption, have bowed to the daemons arriving from the other side, their new masters. This calls for an immediate response!

traits.locale_text: Die Voxsysteme des Schiffs haben einen Notfall gemeldet. In Wartungsbuchten auf den Unterdecks haben sich Warprisse geöffnet, und Raumfahrer, die von magischer Verderbnis in den Wahnsinn getrieben wurden, haben sich Dämonen von der anderen Seite unterworfen und sie als ihre neuen Herren akzeptiert. Das verlangt eine sofortige Reaktion!

languages.text: Geminin voksyayar sistemleri bir acil durum bildirdi. Alt güvertelerdeki bakım bölmelerinde öteboyut yırtıkları ortaya çıktı. Sihirli bir yozlaşmayla deliye dönen uçsuz erleri, diğer taraftan gelen iblislere boyun eğip onların emrine girdi. Durum, acil bir müdahale gerektiriyor!
languages.original_text: The ship's vox-systems have reported an emergency. Warp tears have appeared in maintenance bays on the lower decks, and voidsmen, driven mad by sorcerous corruption, have bowed to the daemons arriving from the other side, their new masters. This calls for an immediate response!
